Title: The Cases That Need to Be Solved
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Matt Olmstead, Cole Maliska (executive story editor), Mo Masi (story editor), Ryan Maldonado (story editor), Eduardo Javier Canto (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: The police investigate a boy's execution-style murder, which may be connected to another shooting. The incident also leads officers and members of the community to gather for a candlelight vigil.
